title: God So Loved
lyrics:
For God so loved the world 
That he gave his only Son Whosoever believes will not perish 
They shall have Eternal life 
I shall hold to the cross I shall hold to God alone For his love has salvaged me 
For his love has set me free 

I shall wait upon the Lord I shall wait upon his word By his grace I am released By his grace I am redeemer 

By His precious blood

I have been set free

For the glory of Jesus'name

I surrender all Now to Christ alone In Jesus I am saved
